Package org.jcatapult.persistence

Interface Summary
PersistenceService This interface defines the core CRUD operations for any object.
Transaction This class is a transaction facade that provides all the methods that most transactions will require and that all the backing implementations should support.
TransactionManager This interface defines the operations that are used by the TransactionMethodInterceptor in order to provide AOP transaction support around method invocations.
TransactionResultProcessor<T> This interface can be implemented and passed to the Transactional annotation.
TransactionState This interface is passed between the methods of the TransactionManager by the JCatapult transaction AOP support.
 

Class Summary
DefaultTransactionResultProcessor<T> This class is the default processor and returns true if the exception is not null and a runtime exception.
DefaultTransactionState This is a simple implementation of the state.
TransactionMethodInterceptor This is the AOP method interceptor that JCatapult uses with Guice's AOP engine in order to provide transaction support around methods.
